text: Structural comparison of apo NanI CD , NanI CD - Neu5Ac and NanI CDdiplacone . ( a ) Overall superposed structures of apo NanI CD ( orange ) and the NanI CD - Neu5Ac ( cyan ) and NanI CD - diplacone ( yellow ) complexes . ( b ) Catalytic site . Diplacone and Neu5Ac molecules are displayed as green and cyan sticks , respectively . Water molecules ( W1 , W2 and W3 ) are shown as red spheres .
